channel.title: Help
channel.description: I am trying to add shops and everything to my server... there was // before a zeke spawn in the spawn.cfg files so i removed the // and compiled and now zeke is in the x y coordinates that came after the //. I was happy that worked. the only problem is that now when i trade zeke he has nothing... So i dont know how to add him to the shops/cfg to change the shop name and his items.. can anyone help me? i have already went to client.java and searched for zeke, horvik, and wanne?
